labor_templates.description: Physical installation of smart locks including mounting, wiring (if applicable), pairing with hub, and initial configuration.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete smart lock installation including:
- Site survey and door assessment
- Remove existing deadbolt/lock
- Install smart lock with proper mounting
- Wire power supply (if hardwired model)
- Pair with hub/controller
- Configure access codes and settings
- Test lock/unlock functionality
- Install batteries and test backup
- Customer demonstration

labor_templates.description: Installation of smart thermostats including removal of old thermostat, wiring verification, mounting, network pairing, and HVAC system testing.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete smart thermostat installation including:
- Turn off HVAC power
- Remove existing thermostat
- Verify and label wiring
- Install mounting plate
- Run additional wiring if needed (C-wire)
- Install thermostat
- Connect to Wi-Fi
- Pair with smart home hub
- Configure HVAC settings
- Test heating/cooling cycles
- Set up schedules
- Customer training

labor_templates.description: Setup and configuration of central hub/controller including network connection, firmware updates, and initial device pairing.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete hub/controller setup including:
- Unbox and inspect hub
- Connect to network (Ethernet preferred)
- Mount hub in optimal location
- Power on and initialize
- Apply firmware updates
- Create admin account
- Configure network settings
- Setup remote access
- Configure security settings
- Initial device discovery
- Backup configuration
- Documentation

labor_templates.description: Installation of security cameras including mounting, cable running, network configuration, and recording setup.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete security camera installation including:
- Site survey for optimal placement
- Run CAT6 cable from camera to switch/NVR
- Mount camera with weather-resistant hardware
- Connect power (PoE or power adapter)
- Configure IP address and network
- Adjust viewing angle and focus
- Configure motion detection zones
- Setup recording schedules
- Integrate with NVR or cloud storage
- Test video quality day/night
- Configure alerts
- Customer demonstration

labor_templates.description: Installation of smart switches and dimmers including electrical wiring, mounting, and configuration.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete smart switch installation including:
- Turn off circuit breaker
- Remove existing switch
- Test for power (safety)
- Verify neutral wire availability
- Install smart switch
- Connect wiring per diagram
- Secure in wall box
- Install wall plate
- Restore power and test
- Pair with hub
- Configure scenes/automation
- Test dimming (if applicable)
- Customer training

labor_templates.description: Network setup and optimization for smart home devices including Wi-Fi configuration, VLAN setup, and quality of service.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete network configuration including:
- Assess existing network infrastructure
- Configure dedicated IoT VLAN (if applicable)
- Setup guest network isolation
- Configure QoS for smart home traffic
- Optimize Wi-Fi channels
- Setup static IP reservations
- Configure DNS settings
- Setup network monitoring
- Document network topology
- Create network diagram
- Test connectivity from all areas
- Security hardening

labor_templates.description: Comprehensive testing of all devices, automations, and integrations before customer handoff.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete system testing including:
- Test each device individually
- Verify network connectivity
- Test local and remote control
- Verify status reporting
- Test automation rules
- Verify triggers and actions
- Test schedules and timers
- Verify scene functionality
- Test device-to-device interactions
- Test mobile app functionality
- Verify cloud connectivity
- Measure response times
- Document test results
- Create punch list
- Resolve outstanding issues

labor_templates.description: Comprehensive customer training on system operation, mobile app usage, and basic troubleshooting.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Complete customer training including:
- System overview and capabilities
- Device operation demonstration
- Mobile app walkthrough
- Creating and editing automations
- Using scenes and modes
- Setting schedules
- Configuring notifications
- Voice control (if applicable)
- Basic troubleshooting
- How to restart devices
- When to call for support
- Provide user manuals
- Create quick reference guide
- Review warranty and maintenance

labor_templates.description: Project management overhead for coordinating installation, managing subcontractors, and customer communication.
labor_templates.detailed_scope:
Project management services including:
- Initial project planning
- Schedule coordination
- Material procurement
- Subcontractor management
- Customer communication
- Change order processing
- Quality assurance
- Issue resolution
- Documentation
- Final walkthrough
- Post-installation follow-up
